title: Library Information
transcript: Welcome to the City Library. We are open Monday to Friday from 9 AM to 6 PM, and weekends from 10 AM to 4 PM. To borrow books, you need a library card which costs five dollars for adults and is free for students under eighteen. You can borrow up to six books at a time for three weeks. If you return books late, there is a fine of fifty cents per day. We also have computers available for one hour sessions, and free Wi-Fi throughout the building.

questions.question: When is the library open on weekends?
